statements: DELETE FROM variant_data WHERE chromosome = 'X' AND position > 100000
DELETE FROM Variants WHERE chromosome_number = 1 AND position = 100 AND severity_level = 'Mild'
DELETE FROM Diseases WHERE disease_name = 'Cancer' AND associated_genes LIKE '%BRCA%'
DELETE FROM variants WHERE variant_id = 100 AND gene_name = 'BRCA1';
DELETE FROM predispositions WHERE risk_level = 'High' OR risk_level = 'Medium';
DELETE FROM DiseaseVariantMapping WHERE disease_id = 3 AND variant_id = 5;
DELETE FROM patient_variants WHERE patient_id = 1 AND variant_id = 3;
DELETE FROM patient_variants WHERE patient_id = 1 AND variant_id = 3;
DELETE FROM studies WHERE study_name = 'Cancer Study' AND researcher_name = 'Dr. Smith';
